short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap your language-mistyped sentences from English to Hebrew and vice versa instantly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
שיפט מאפשר לך לתקן משפטים שלמים של גי'בריש בלחיצת כפתור בודדת!

Stop rewriting over and over your language-mistyped sentences.

Shift enables you to turn your mistakenly typed sentences from English to Hebrew and vice versa instantly.

Simply click the Shift key (Pressed alone) to flip the entire text or mark the phrases you need to change and click the Shift to flip it between English and Hebrew to the correct language.

The app support all types of text boxes and runs also inside embedded IFrames.

Save wasted time and effort using this immediate perfect solution!
